overview: A loose adaptation of The Seven Samurai and the Magnificent Seven in which a recent parolee named Bravo sets out to round up his old posse to save a womanâ€™s ranch from a ruthless drug lord. Only problem is that all his desperado friends are dead. So, with the help of a Mexican witch, he resurrects them for one last mission only to find out that wrangling the dead is a lot like herding cats.
title: Seven Cemeteries
